scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:rag"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.dev:rag: cd rag-service && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8001
scripts.lint: uv run ruff check backend/ rag-service/
scripts.format: uv run ruff format backend/ rag-service/
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && uv run alembic upgrade head
